title: Lesson 10
paragraph: Technology and science shape modern life: devices, networks and software let us connect, store data and run programs. Understanding basic terms like battery, camera and internet helps users solve common problems and use tools effectively.

words.meaning: a device that stores energy to power electronics
words.example: Charge the phone battery before the trip.

words.meaning: a small control on a device you press to operate it
words.example: Press the power button to turn it on.

words.meaning: a device for taking photos or recording video
words.example: She bought a new camera for the holiday.

words.meaning: to supply electrical power to a battery or device
words.example: Charge the laptop overnight.

words.meaning: to press a mouse button or select something on the screen
words.example: Click the link to open the page.

words.meaning: an electronic device for processing data
words.example: The computer crashed during the test.

words.meaning: a link between devices or networks
words.example: The internet connection is slow today.

words.meaning: facts or information stored or used by computers
words.example: Back up your data regularly.

words.meaning: a piece of technical equipment
words.example: Turn off the device when not in use.

words.meaning: using numbers or electronic technology
words.example: We store photos in a digital format.

words.meaning: to copy data from the internet to your device
words.example: Download the file before the meeting.

words.meaning: energy used to power devices
words.example: Turn off lights to save electricity.

words.meaning: a document or data stored on a computer
words.example: Save the file in the project folder.

words.meaning: a global network connecting computers and websites
words.example: Search for information on the internet.

words.meaning: the device with keys used to type
words.example: Use the keyboard to write the report.

words.meaning: a portable computer
words.example: He took his laptop to the café.

words.meaning: a device with moving parts that performs tasks
words.example: The machine completes the work faster.

words.meaning: storage in a device for holding data
words.example: This phone has plenty of memory for photos.

words.meaning: relating to cell phones or portable devices
words.example: Access the website on your mobile device.

words.meaning: a handheld device used to move the cursor on a computer screen
words.example: Move the mouse to select the icon.

words.meaning: a group of connected computers or devices
words.example: The company upgraded its network.

words.meaning: connected to the internet
words.example: We attended the seminar online.

words.meaning: a secret word or phrase used to access accounts
words.example: Choose a strong password to protect your account.

words.meaning: a machine that produces paper copies from digital files
words.example: Send the document to the printer.

words.meaning: a set of instructions a computer follows
words.japaneseMeaning: プログラム、ソフトウェア
words.example: Install the program before starting.

words.meaning: a device used to control equipment from a distance
words.example: Use the remote to change the channel.

words.meaning: a machine capable of carrying out tasks automatically
words.example: The robot helps in the factory.

words.meaning: the display surface of an electronic device
words.example: The screen is cracked after the fall.

words.meaning: an electrical or radio transmission
words.example: The phone lost signal in the tunnel.

words.meaning: a mobile phone with advanced functions like internet access
words.example: She checks email on her smartphone.

words.meaning: programs that run on computers and devices
words.example: Update your software regularly.

words.meaning: a device that produces sound
words.example: Connect the speaker to your laptop.

words.meaning: the application of scientific knowledge for practical use
words.example: Technology changes how we learn.

words.meaning: an instrument used to perform a task
words.example: Use the right tool for the job.

words.meaning: to make something more modern or to install the latest version
words.japaneseMeaning: 更新する、アップデート
words.example: Update your app to fix bugs.

words.meaning: to transfer data from your device to the internet
words.example: Upload the photo to the website.

words.meaning: a recording of moving images and sound
words.example: Watch the video tutorial to learn faster.

words.meaning: existing by computer simulation rather than physically
words.example: We had a virtual meeting with the team.

words.meaning: a set of web pages on the internet
words.example: Check the website for opening hours.

words.meaning: wireless technology for connecting to the internet
words.example: Connect to Wi-Fi to save data usage.
